description: Try our easy to follow Rump Steaks - Spanish Salt Seasoning recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Rump Steaks - Spanish Salt Seasoning Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Finely grate rind of lemon and combine with sea salt flakes, paprika, oregano, garlic salt, saffron threads and white pepper in a mortar and pestle. Grind until a fine salt forms.
Sprinkle mixture evenly onto both sides of the steaks. Cook on a preheated BBQ plate for 4-5 minutes on each side for medium-rare or until cooked to your liking.
